definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
to shift one's eyes/(fig.) to shift one's attention/to divert attention

sentences.english: His vision blurred and a wave of dizziness washed over him.
sentences.chinese: 他的視線模糊了，一陣頭暈目眩衝擊着他。

sentences.english: Note any cerumen or earwax that may impair your view.
sentences.chinese: 注意任何的耳垢或者耳屎可能會影響你的視線。

sentences.english: Every time I watched this movie, my tears welled up in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 在看《剪刀手愛德華》時，淚水模糊了我的視線。

sentences.english: Ahsoka looked up shortly, her gaze bouncing back from the white armoured back like a thief.
sentences.chinese: 阿索卡將視線轉回白甲背影，小偷似的瞄了一下。

sentences.english: John is hen -pecked husband if there ever was one . His wife almost never lets him out of her sight .
sentences.chinese: 約翰非常怕老婆，他太太幾乎不讓他離開她的視線。

sentences.english: Looking away from people or yawning will, in most cases, make me appear to be uninterested .
sentences.chinese: 轉移視線或不停地打哈欠大多說明這個人不感興趣。

sentences.english: Clinginess . Your child suddenly becomes excessively clingy or won't let you out of sight.
sentences.chinese: 孩子突然變得過於粘人，或者不能讓你走出他的視線。

sentences.english: Ping-pong balls sliced in half were placed over their eyes to obscure vision.
sentences.chinese: 切成半個的乒乓球扣在他們的眼睛上來遮擋視線。

sentences.english: A night of depth, stretched to the horizon of the curtain of night is covering up my line of sight thickly.
sentences.chinese: 夜已深，一望無垠的夜幕厚厚實實地遮掩着我的視線。

sentences.english: For a long time that you have been out of my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 要知道你已太長時間沒進過我的視線。

sentences.english: Right screenshot on the image at the bottom describes the scan path of a given page.
sentences.chinese: 右下方的路徑圖顯示了用戶瀏覽一個網頁的視線軌跡。

sentences.english: By default, the line-of-site vector is normal to the screen.
sentences.chinese: 依預設，視線向量正垂於螢幕。

sentences.english: But that unexpected sight at the foot of my brothers bed was it for me.
sentences.chinese: 但意想不到的視線，在山下我的兄弟牀，是它爲我。

sentences.english: The car turned left at the corner and disappeared from our view.
sentences.chinese: 汽車在拐角處向左拐，然後就從我們的視線中消失了。

sentences.english: By the time he does this, the first truck is well out of sight.
sentences.chinese: 當他加好油後，第一輛卡車已經開出視線之外了。

sentences.english: He averts his eyes from the terrible sight.
sentences.chinese: 他轉移視線不看那可怕的景象。

definition: to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
nutation (plants turning to face the sun)
to turn one's head/to change direction/U-turn/volte face/to repent
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
